snippet: Politicians who have been winning in the mid- and Deep South are now discussing how their conservative platforms could be altered for a national electorate.
abstract: Republican politicians who continue to win elections in Deep South are aware of party's image problems in rest of country, and are joining discussion of how party's conservative platforms could be altered for national electorate.
lead_paragraph: Politicians who have been winning in the mid- and Deep South are now discussing how their conservative platforms could be altered for a national electorate.

headline.main: Hard-Nosed Approach Wins Votes in the South, but Lacks Broader Appeal
headline.print_headline: Hard-Nosed Approach Wins Votes in the South, but Lacks Broader Appeal
